log_level.name: Log level
log_level.description: Controls the level of log output by the addon.

ollama_base_url.name: Ollama Base URL
ollama_base_url.description: The base URL for your Ollama instance (e.g., http://supervisor:11434)

webui_secret_key.name: WebUI Secret Key
webui_secret_key.description: Secret key for session management. Leave empty for auto-generation.

default_models.name: Default Models
default_models.description: Comma-separated list of default models to load on startup.

enable_signup.name: Enable User Signup
enable_signup.description: Allow new users to create accounts.

enable_login_form.name: Enable Login Form
enable_login_form.description: Show login form on the interface.

enable_web_search.name: Enable Web Search
enable_web_search.description: Enable web search functionality in conversations.

web_search_engine.name: Web Search Engine
web_search_engine.description: Search engine to use for web searches.

automatic_1111_base_url.name: Automatic1111 Base URL
automatic_1111_base_url.description: Base URL for Automatic1111 Stable Diffusion instance.

openai_api_base_url.name: OpenAI API Base URL
openai_api_base_url.description: Base URL for OpenAI-compatible API endpoints.

openai_api_key.name: OpenAI API Key
openai_api_key.description: API key for OpenAI or compatible services.

model_filter_list.name: Model Filter List
model_filter_list.description: Comma-separated list of models to show when filtering is enabled.
